verses.verse: Oh give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>; Make known <S%H3045><s%> among the peoples <S%H5971><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him <S%H2167><s%>, sing praises unto him <S%H7878><s%>; Talk ye of all his marvelous works <S%H6381><s%>.
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>: Let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> and his strength <S%H5797><s%>; Seek <S%H1245><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> evermore <S%H8548><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvellous works <S%H6381><s%> that he hath done <S%H6213><s%>, His wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>,
O ye seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, Ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, his chosen ones <S%H972><s%>.
He is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>: His judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He hath remembered <S%H2142><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, The word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>,
The covenant which he made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%>, And his oath <S%H7621><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3446><s%>,
And confirmed <S%H5975><s%> the same unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a statute <S%H2706><s%>, To Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thee will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, The lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>;
When they were but a few men <S%H4962><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%>, Yea <S%H4592><s%>, very few, and sojourners in it <S%H1481><s%>.
And they went <S%H1980><s%> about from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation <S%H4467><s%>, From one kingdom to another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.
He suffered <S%H3240><s%> no man <S%H120><s%> to do them wrong <S%H6231><s%>; Yea <S%H3198><s%>, he reproved kings for their sakes <S%H4428><s%>,
Saying <S%H5060><s%>, Touch not mine anointed <S%H4899><s%> ones <S%H5030><s%>, And do my prophets no harm <S%H7489><s%>.
And he called <S%H7121><s%> for a famine <S%H7458><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>; He brake <S%H7665><s%> the whole staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H3130><s%>; Joseph was sold <S%H4376><s%> for a servant <S%H5650><s%>:
His feet <S%H7272><s%> they hurt <S%H6031><s%> with fetters <S%H3525><s%>: He <S%H5315><s%> was laid <S%H935><s%> in chains of iron <S%H1270><s%>,
Until the time <S%H6256><s%> that his word <S%H1697><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to pass <S%H565><s%>, The word of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> tried him <S%H6884><s%>.
The king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and loosed <S%H5425><s%> him <S%H4910><s%>; Even the ruler of peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and let him go free <S%H6605><s%>.
He made <S%H7760><s%> him lord <S%H113><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, And ruler <S%H4910><s%> of all his substance <S%H7075><s%>;
To bind <S%H631><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%> at his pleasure <S%H5315><s%>, And teach his elders <S%H2205><s%> wisdom <S%H2449><s%>.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>.
And he increased <S%H6509><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>, And made them stronger <S%H6105><s%> than their adversaries <S%H6862><s%>.
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> to hate <S%H8130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, To deal subtly <S%H5230><s%> with his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, And Aaron <S%H175><s%> whom he had chosen <S%H977><s%>.
They set <S%H7760><s%> among them his signs <S%H226><s%>, And wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%>, and made it dark <S%H2821><s%>; And they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> not against his words <S%H1697><s%>.
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> into blood <S%H1818><s%>, And slew <S%H4191><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%>.
Their land <S%H776><s%> swarmed <S%H8317><s%> with <S%H8317><s%> frogs <S%H6854><s%> In the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of their kings <S%H4428><s%>.
He spake <S%H559><s%>, and there came <S%H935><s%> swarms of flies <S%H6157><s%>, And lice <S%H3654><s%> in all their borders <S%H1366><s%>.
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them hail <S%H1259><s%> for rain <S%H1653><s%>, And flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>.
He smote <S%H5221><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> also and their fig-trees <S%H8384><s%>, And brake <S%H7665><s%> the trees <S%H8384><s%> of their borders <S%H1366><s%>.
He spake <S%H559><s%>, and the locust <S%H697><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, And the grasshopper <S%H3218><s%>, and that without number <S%H4557><s%>,
And did eat up <S%H398><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, And did eat <S%H398><s%> up the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their ground <S%H127><s%>.
He smote <S%H5221><s%> also all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, The chief <S%H7225><s%> of all their strength <S%H202><s%>.
And he brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>; And there was not one feeble <S%H3782><s%> person among his tribes <S%H7626><s%>.
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they departed <S%H3318><s%>; For the fear <S%H6343><s%> of them had fallen upon them <S%H5307><s%>.
He spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> for a covering <S%H4539><s%>, And fire <S%H784><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>.
They asked <S%H7592><s%>, and he brought <S%H935><s%> quails <S%H7958><s%>, And satisfied <S%H7646><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
He opened <S%H6605><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%>, and waters <S%H4325><s%> gushed out <S%H2100><s%>; They ran <S%H1980><s%> in the dry places <S%H6723><s%> like a river <S%H5104><s%>.
For he remembered <S%H2142><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> word <S%H1697><s%>, And Abraham <S%H85><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>.
And he brought forth <S%H3318><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with joy <S%H8342><s%>, And his chosen <S%H972><s%> with singing <S%H7440><s%>.
And he gave <S%H5414><s%> them the lands <S%H776><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>; And they took the labor <S%H5999><s%> of the peoples <S%H3816><s%> in possession <S%H3423><s%>:
That they might keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, And observe <S%H8104><s%> his laws <S%H8451><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
